channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Health
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Health

item.title: CVE-2023-42539|2023-11-07T07:49:37.521Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20health
item.description: PendingIntent hijacking vulnerability in ChallengeNotificationManager in Samsung Health prior to version 6.25 allows local attackers to access data.

item.title: CVE-2023-30737|2023-10-04T03:02:50.446Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20health
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Samsung Health prior to version 6.24.3.007 allows attackers to access sensitive information via implicit intent.

item.title: CVE-2023-30734|2023-10-04T03:02:47.370Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20health
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Samsung Health prior to version 6.24.3.007 allows attackers to access sensitive information via implicit intent.

item.title: CVE-2023-30723|2023-09-06T03:12:10.182Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20health
item.description: Improper input validation vulnerability in Samsung Health prior to version 6.24.2.011 allows attackers to write arbitrary file with Samsung Health privilege.
